original_text:
For he will complete what he appoints for me,
    and many such things are in his mind.
korean_text: 그런즉 내게 작정하신 것을 이루실 것이라 이런 일이 그에게 많이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: For he will complete what he appoints for me
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 나를 위해 정하신 것을 이루리라

sentences.original_text: and many such things are in his mind.
